name: Draw Puzzle Friday Night Music
description:
Welcome to Draw Puzzle Friday Night Music game!

Draw Puzzle Friday Night Music is a draw game combined with rhythm music battle. At the end of each level, Draw Puzzle Friday Night Music will provide you with catchy music.
Activate your brain and your artistic talents to draw missing part and enjoy the music battle.

HOW TO PLAY
- Identify the missing part
- Draw one part - DOP: only one single line accepted
- Click Button to ask for a hint if you are stuck.
- Enjoy catchy music in battle at the end of each level

FEATURES
- Combination of puzzle games and music.
- Explore 100+ various level with music.
- Beautiful high-resolution graphics
- Music and sound effects
- Phone and tablet support

Download Draw Puzzle Friday Night Music for free now. Challenge your brain, feel music and rock the beat!
